A. Yes is the correct answer
Slicer Usage: Slicers in Power BI are used to filter data within a Power BI report. They can be used to filter data based on selected values, but they typically operate within the Power BI report itself. If you want to filter data in the Power BI report based on the context of a selected record in your canvas app, you would need to pass the selected record's information to the Power BI report, and the report should be configured to use that information for filtering.
